specifications.Finish: Chemical > PU Coated (back) PU coated is a thin polyurethane layer applied to the fabricâ€™s backside, providing water resistance and windproof properties.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > PU Coated (back) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Water Resistant Waterproof is a specially coated fabric that prevents water penetration to a certain degree, though it may not be completely impermeable. This treatment helps protect the wearer or the item from rain and moisture, making it suitable for outerwear, bags, and outdoor gear. Windproof Windproof is a function that blocks wind from passing through and helps retain body heat. Recommended Use Activewear, Windbreakers, Raincoat
